DOC.detailed_description: We propose double-blind , randomize control trial test effectiveness 1 . Active I ( n=70 ) : monthly high-dose vitamin D3 supplement dose ( 60'000 IU/month , equivalent 2000 IU daily ) , 2 . Active II ( n=70 ) : monthly standard vitamin D3 supplement dose combine 25 ( OH ) D ( 24'000 IU/month , equivalent 800 IU daily PLUS 300 mcg 25 ( OH ) D , equivalent 10 mcg per day ) 3 . Control ( n=70 ) : compare standard vitamin D3 supplement dose ( 24'000 IU/month , equivalent 800 IU daily ) All individual advise consume calcium natural food source daily dose 600-800 mg day , include milk product . Maximal intake supplemental calcium restrict 250 mg per day .
